actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to repeal the lowest unit rate provisions of section 315(b) of the Communications Act of 1934.

summary.text: Provides that the charges made for the use of any broadcasting station by any person who is a legally qualified candidate for any public office in connection with his campaign for nomination for election, or election, to such office shall not exceed the charges made for the comparable use of such station by other users. (Amends 47 U.S.C. 315(b))

titles.title: A bill to repeal the lowest unit rate provisions of section 315(b) of the Communications Act of 1934.
